remarks: The morphism map of a faithful functor is an injection.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jan-2017.)
statement:
isfth.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
isfth.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
isfth.j $e |- J = ( Hom ` D ) $.
fthf1.f $e |- ( ph -> F ( C Faith D ) G ) $.
fthf1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
fthf1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
fthf1 $p |- ( ph -> ( X G Y ) : ( X H Y ) -1-1-> ( ( F ` X ) J ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
